name: G. Unequal Adjacent Elements
statement:
You are given an array a consisting of n positive integers. Find any
permutation p of [1,2,
dots,n] such that: p_{i-2} < p_i for all i, where 3
leq i
leq n, and a_{p_{i-1}}
neq a_{p_i} for all i, where 2
leq i
leq n. Or report that no such permutation exists.
